name: Ratan Tata
title: Chairman Emeritus of Tata Sons
background: Led Tata Group for over two decades, transformed it into a global conglomerate
education: B.S. in Architecture from Cornell University, Advanced Management Program from Harvard
inspiration_quote: I don't believe in taking right decisions. I take decisions and then make them right.
advice: Lead with humility, think long-term, and always give back to society.
indian_context: Icon of Indian industry and ethical business leadership

name: Sundar Pichai
title: CEO of Google and Alphabet
background: Started as a software engineer, led Chrome and Android projects before becoming CEO
education: B.Tech from IIT Kharagpur, MS from Stanford, MBA from Wharton
inspiration_quote: It is important to follow your dreams and heart. Do something that excites you.
advice: Focus on building great products that help people, and opportunities will follow.
indian_context: From IIT Kharagpur to global tech leadership

name: Mukesh Ambani
title: Chairman of Reliance Industries
background: Built Reliance into India's most valuable company, pioneered telecom revolution with Jio
education: Chemical Engineering from ICT Mumbai, Stanford University (dropped out)
inspiration_quote: Think big, think fast, think ahead. Ideas are no one's monopoly.
advice: Disrupt yourself before others disrupt you. Scale with speed and vision.
indian_context: Transformed Indian telecom and digital landscape

name: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw
title: Executive Chairperson of Biocon
background: Started Biocon in her garage, built it into India's largest biopharmaceutical company
education: Bachelor's in Zoology from Bangalore University, Postgraduate Diploma in Malting and Brewing
inspiration_quote: I believe that entrepreneurship is about solving problems and creating value for society.
advice: Don't let gender or background limit your ambitions. Focus on solving real problems.
indian_context: Pioneer of Indian biotech industry and women entrepreneurship

name: N.R. Narayana Murthy
title: Co-founder of Infosys
background: Co-founded Infosys with ₹10,000, built it into a global IT services giant
education: B.E. in Electrical Engineering from University of Mysore, M.Tech from IIT Kanpur
inspiration_quote: Progress is often equal to the difference between mind and mindset.
advice: Lead by example, maintain highest ethical standards, and create value for all stakeholders.
indian_context: Pioneer who put Indian IT on the global map

name: Radhika Gupta
title: CEO of Edelweiss Asset Management
background: Youngest CEO of an asset management company in India, overcame personal challenges
education: Economics from University of Pennsylvania, MBA from Wharton
inspiration_quote: Your struggles don't define you, your response to them does.
advice: Turn your vulnerabilities into strengths and never let setbacks define your future.
indian_context: Breaking barriers in male-dominated financial services industry

name: Byju Raveendran
title: Founder and CEO of BYJU'S
background: Started as a teacher, built BYJU'S into India's most valuable edtech startup
education: B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering from Government Engineering College Kannur
inspiration_quote: Learning should be engaging, effective, and enjoyable for every student.
advice: Focus on solving real problems with passion and persistence.
indian_context: Transformed Indian education through technology and marketing

name: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
title: Former President of India, Missile Man of India
background: Aerospace scientist who became India's most beloved President, inspired millions
education: Aerospace Engineering from Madras Institute of Technology
inspiration_quote: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.
advice: Dream big, work hard, and never stop learning. Science should serve humanity.
indian_context: Icon of scientific achievement and humble leadership

name: Nandan Nilekani
title: Co-founder of Infosys, Architect of Aadhaar
background: Co-founded Infosys, later led India's digital identity project Aadhaar
education: B.Tech in Electrical Engineering from IIT Bombay
inspiration_quote: Technology is best when it brings people together and solves real problems.
achievements: Built Infosys into global IT giant
advice: Think big, start small, and scale fast. Technology should serve humanity.
indian_context: Pioneer of Indian IT industry and digital governance

name: Falguni Nayar
title: Founder and CEO of Nykaa
background: Former investment banker who founded India's leading beauty e-commerce platform
inspiration_quote: It's never too late to chase your entrepreneurial dreams.
advice: Understand your customers deeply and build products they truly love.
indian_context: Success story of women entrepreneurship in Indian e-commerce

name: Ritesh Agarwal
title: Founder and CEO of OYO Hotels
background: Started OYO at age 19, built it into one of the world's largest hotel chains
inspiration_quote: Age is just a number when you have the passion to solve real problems.
advice: Start early, think big, and never stop learning from failures.
indian_context: Young entrepreneur who built global business from India

name: Dr. Devi Shetty
title: Cardiac Surgeon, Chairman of Narayana Health
background: Renowned cardiac surgeon who made healthcare affordable and accessible
education: MBBS from Kasturba Medical College, Cardiac Surgery training in UK
inspiration_quote: Healthcare is a basic human right, not a privilege for the wealthy.
advice: Combine clinical excellence with innovation to serve more people effectively.
indian_context: Revolutionized affordable healthcare delivery in India

name: Raghuram Rajan
title: Former RBI Governor, Professor at Chicago Booth
background: Distinguished economist who served as RBI Governor and Chief Economist at IMF
education: B.Tech from IIT Delhi, MBA and PhD from MIT Sloan
inspiration_quote: In a democracy, the well-being, individuality and happiness of every citizen is important.
advice: Combine rigorous analysis with practical understanding of ground realities.
indian_context: From IIT to global financial leadership and RBI governance

name: Vinod Rai
title: Former CAG of India, Former Chairman of Banks Board Bureau
background: Distinguished civil servant who served as Comptroller and Auditor General of India
education: B.A. from St. Stephen's College, Delhi, IAS 1972 batch
inspiration_quote: Public service is about serving the nation with integrity and dedication.
advice: Maintain integrity and focus on public welfare in all decisions.
indian_context: Exemplary civil servant who strengthened Indian governance

name: Vijay Shekhar Sharma
title: Founder and CEO of Paytm
background: Built Paytm into India's largest digital payments platform
education: B.Tech from Delhi College of Engineering
inspiration_quote: Build for India, build for the world. Technology should democratize access.
advice: Focus on solving problems for the masses, not just the elite.
indian_context: Democratized digital payments across urban and rural India

name: Priyanka Chopra Jonas
title: Global Actress, Producer, UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador
background: Bollywood actress who became global star, built personal brand across entertainment and business
education: Various schools due to family transfers, self-taught in business and branding
inspiration_quote: I've always been someone who has believed that you have to reinvent yourself.
advice: Be authentic, work hard, and don't be afraid to take risks in new markets.
indian_context: Successful global brand ambassador for Indian talent and culture
